Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Loop-bound Brown Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Irving Park. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Loop-bound Brown Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Irving Park.
 
Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
